featuresGrid.title: Everything you need to
featuresGrid.subtitle: Features designed for the day-to-day of civil construction, from office to jobsite.

features.f1Desc: Organize architectural, structural, hydraulic, electrical, and foundation projects in a hierarchical structure by development, building, and discipline.
features.f2Desc: Complete revision history with full traceability. Each version recorded with author, date, comments, and approval. Never work with an outdated file again.
features.f3Desc: Automatically distribute projects and blueprints to designers, field teams, and suppliers. Real-time notifications when a new revision is published.
features.f4Desc: Configurable approval workflows with multiple levels: designer → coordinator → manager. Real-time status: under review, approved, rejected with comments.
features.f5Desc: Compatible with Revit, ArchiCAD, and Tekla. Upload IFC models, view them in 3D on the platform, and link to the corresponding project.
features.f6Desc: Digital records with photos, notes, weather conditions, and activity tracking. Everything documented, traceable, and exportable.
features.f7Desc: Find any project, blueprint, or document in seconds. Search by name, discipline, revision, author, date, or tag. Advanced filters by development.
features.f8Desc: End-to-end encryption, granular profile-based access control, and automatic backup. Define who can view, edit, approve, or distribute each document.
features.f9Desc: Dashboards with productivity metrics, approval timelines, pending documents, and compliance. Exportable reports for coordination meetings.
features.f10Desc: Access projects and blueprints directly from the jobsite via mobile app. View, comment, and approve documents from anywhere, online or offline.
